snippet.title: Sonic After the Sequel — Widescreen Cutscenes
snippet.description:
This was the project made for not really successful Sonic After the Sequel Omega. Still got a lot of fun remastering the cutscenes! You can get SATSO here:
https://gamejolt.com/games/satso/376344
#AfterTheSequel #Cutscenes #Sonic
♦ Subscribe and don't miss all-new animations
https://bit.ly/2UTAqOm
♦ Check out more by playing this playlist
https://bit.ly/2PSfpCc

╾╾╾╾╾╾╾╾╾ CREDITS ╾╾╾╾╾╾╾╾╾
✔ All original characters, sprites and music are the property of SEGA 
✔ Original ATS cutscenes and sprites made by LakeFeperd

Animation made with Adobe Animate and Adobe After Effects
© Triangly
